item.title: N States
item.description: The Premise We’ve come a long way since writing the first line of software. The premise of building software has always been simple: automate or solve a problem. From creating straightforward inventory software that ran locally on machines to cloud infrastructure, one thing has always remained constant in software development. States A rudimentary definition of what a state is can be understood as the value of variables at any given point in time which is stored in the memory.
